'''1.12.1-pre1'''<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-snapshot-17w31a|Minecraft Pre-release 1.12.1-pre1|August 2, 2017}}</ref> is the first and only pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.12.1]], which includes minor optimizations and fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.12.1 Pre-Release 1|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|117087|{{cd|Class.getSimpleName}} performance issue with large number of block entities.
|86016|Some Mojang staff not mentioned in <code>credits.txt</code>.
|;dev
|119840|[[Diamond]]s get moved into crafting slots on any chat message.
'''Other'''
* Minor optimizations.
}}</onlyinclude>
